channel.title: Other on Boziuk
channel.description: Recent content in Other on Boziuk

item.title: Personal Projects
item.description: Some other personal projects of interest: Sound board app with numpad keybinds. Useful for adding sound effects when recording, if the system sound is routed to an input (i.e., using jack, Cadence, Ardour, and other packages from the KXStudio project.) https://github.com/thomasboziuk/soundboard
